rawquery.query: SELECT if(messages.m_from=$profileId,messages.m_to,messages.m_from) as m_from,profile.name,min(messages.m_read) as msgread,max(messages.msgdate) as msgdate FROM messages inner join  profile on messages.m_from = profile.id where messages.m_to=$profileId or messages.m_from=$profileId group by messages.m_from,profile.name;
